channel.title: CVE Feed for GRANDIT CORPORATION -- GRANDIT

item.title: CVE-2020-5539|2024-08-04T08:30:24.499Z -- grandit%20corporation -- grandit
item.description: GRANDIT Ver.1.6, Ver.2.0, Ver.2.1, Ver.2.2, Ver.2.3, and Ver.3.0 do not properly manage sessions, which allows remote attackers to impersonate an arbitrary user and then alter or disclose the information via unspecified vectors.
